entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 4.

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023
